quote: The Rest of Our Life Is Going To Be The Best of Our Life!
author: Darrell Yarbrough

quote: In art the best is good enough.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Having the best doesn't make you the best but producing the best makes you the best
author: ejembi louis

quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
author: Henry Ford

quote: To love and win is the best thing.To love and lose, the next best.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: We learn best when we care about what we are doing, when we have choices. We learn best when the work has meaning to us, when it matters. We learn best when we are using our hands and our minds.We learn best when the work we are doing is real and relevant.
author: Dennis Littky,  The Big Picture: Education Is Everyone's Business

quote: First best is falling in love. Second best is being in love. Least best is falling out of love. But any of it is better than never having been in love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You have to let go better to embrace the best.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: hope for the best, prepare for the worst
author: Chris Bradford,  The Ring of Earth

quote: Try your best; forget the rest.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I have seen the best of you, and the worst of you, and I choose both.
author: Sarah Kay

quote: You may not be the best, but you should not remain in the rest.
author: Sourav Adhikari

quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the mext moment
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I am the best person in the universe.
author: Kendrick Nguyen

quote: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Done is better than perfect.
author: Sheryl Sandberg,  Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If you want the best the world has to offer, offer the world your best.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Better than chocolate, being with you last night. Silly me, I thought that nothing was better than chocolate.
author: E. Lockhart,  We Were Liars

quote: Happy wife, happy life.
author: Paul Orfalea,  Copy This!: Lessons from a Hyperactive Dyslexic who Turned a Bright Idea Into One of America's Best Companies

quote: The greatest thing about tomorrow is, I will be better than I am today. And that's how I look at my life. I will be a better golfer, I will be a better person, I will be a better father, I will be a better husband, I will be a better friend. That's the beauty of tomorrow.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: The best use of life is love. The best expression of love is time. The best time to love is now.
author: Rick Warren

quote: Poetry: the best words in the best order.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: On my honor, I will do my bestTo do my duty To God and my country
author: Boy Scouts of America

quote: Memories are the best things in life, I think.
author: Romy Schneider

quote: You are the only you ... You are the best you. You will always be the second best anyone else.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: The human body is the best work of art.
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: It was better to know the worst than to wonder.
author: Margaret Mitchell,  Gone with the Wind

quote: Broadly speaking, the short words are the best, and the old words best of all.
author: Winston S. Churchill,  Never Give In!: The Best of Winston Churchill's Speeches

quote: The best stories don't come from "good vs. bad"but "good vs. good.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: You are my best friend as well as my lover, and I do not know which side of you I enjoy the most. I treasure each side, just as I have treasured our life together.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quote: Babe!
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Kitten, your hands are heaven and your eyes are my home.
author: Jeaniene Frost,  This Side of the Grave

quote: To look life in the face, always, to look life in the face, and to know it for what it is...at last, to love it for what it is, and then, to put it away...
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A mighty pain to love it is,And 't is a pain that pain to miss;But of all pains, the greatest painIt is to love, but love in vain.
author: Abraham Cowley,  The Poems of Abraham Cowley

quote: Laters, baby.
author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey

quote: Do your best and let God do the rest.
author: Ben Carson

quote: And if you couldn't be loved, the next best thing was to be let alone.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: You’re my best friend,You’re my love,You’re my life.I can’t wait tomake youmy wife!Love, Ryan
author: Tina Reber,  Love Unrehearsed

quote: The best love in the world, is the love of a man. The love of a man who came from your womb, the love of your son! I don't have a daughter, but maybe the love of a daughter is the best, too. I am first and foremost me, but right after that, I am a mother. The best thing that I can ever be, is me. But the best gift that I will ever have, is being a mother.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The best smell in the world is that man that you love.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: Hope for the best, survive the worst, find humor wherever you can.
author: Claire Scovell LaZebnik

quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
author: Leigh Hunt
